price: ¿Acaso comparten [con Dios] la soberanía? [No la tienen, pero] si la tuvieran, no darían lo más mínimo a la gente [debido a su avaricia].
arabic: أَمۡ لَهُمۡ نَصِيبٞ مِّنَ ٱلۡمُلۡكِ فَإِذٗا لَّا يُؤۡتُونَ ٱلنَّاسَ نَقِيرًا

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: am lahum naṣībun mina al-mul'ki fa-idhan lā yu'tūna al-nāsa naqīran
translations: (even as much as the) speck on a date seed
